description: Zesty lemon and fresh Australian lamb make for a lipsmacking bite of roasted goodness, best paired with baked potatoes.
keywords: Lamb Leg Roast With Lemon & Garlic
name: Lamb Leg Roast With Lemon & Garlic Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Meanwhile, cook peas according to packet instructions. Serve lamb scattered with oregano and with potatoes, garlic and peas, drizzled with pan juices.
